item.description:
What a great mix of positive thoughts and ideas combined with lots of light-hearted laughter and fun.

We had a lot of fun with "Ordering From The Cosmic Kitchen", so we voted to continue with it next time.

Some people ordered dinner, some just drinks - either way is fine.

See you all soon!

Laurie
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for The Abundance Group

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Abundance and Empowerment Meet Up "Cosmic Kitchen 2"
